import React from 'react' import products from '../products' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = () => { const {id} = useParams() const product = products.find((p) => (p._id) == (id)); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 {product.description} Price: $ {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
